markdownRemark.html:
NDArray

Nth dimensional array

Models

Static computation graphs

  • Perceptron
  • FFNN

Dynamic computation graphs

  • RNN (Recurrent Neural N)
  • FFNN

Frameworks

Tensorflow

Tensorflow is to be coded in a declarative fashion. It is a perfect match for dynamic computation graphs.

Which is not good for RNNs (Recurrent Neural Network) as well as for GANNs (Generative Adversarial Neural Networks)

PyTorch

PyTorch is to be coded in a imperative fashion. It is a perfect match for dynamic computation graphs.
